features: 👍MULTI-FUNCTIONAL OFFICE CHAIR--Features adjustable headrest, 4D flip armrest, adjustable lumbar support and height adjustment, 3-position tilt lock, all included in this chair. We believe this classic and modern chair will enhance your comfort to a new level. We focus on the chair so you can focus on your work study game!

👍BREATHABLE MESH OFFICE CHAIR--Highly breathable self-supporting mesh composite is weaved to offer ventilated comfort for all seasons. Highly durable in strength, it has been rigorously tested for 120,000 cycles/times under BIFMA standards. The waterfall seat design also helps reduce stress on your legs

👍ADJUSTABLE LUMBAR SUPPORT--Curved back support to keep your back and your body properly aligned. Including adjustable lumbar support, so you can move up and down to the desired height according to your needs

👍2 in 1 TILT LOCK& HEIGHT CONTROL--Maximum 120° tilt with 3 lock-in recline positions and adjustable tension, experience enhanced ergonomic comfort that helps improve productivity and efficiency, and work-from-home will now feel like heaven! Moreover, you can also adjust the seat height by turning the handle up or down

👍SOLID CONSTRUCTION, CERTIFIED COMFORT--360-degree swivel, heavy-duty nylon base, and smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility. BIFMA certification, more reliable and sturdy, maximum capacity up to 275 lbs. A 12-month warranty applies to all parts

👍RISK-FREE PURCHASE,BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!--Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority! All the necessary hardware and tools are included with this mesh chair.Easy to install and ready to use in about 10-15 minutes. Should you have any questions about this product, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will spare no effort to assist you with any questions ! Click to Add Cart Now!

👍NATIONWIDE MULTI-WAREHOUSE DISPATCH--Select the appropriate warehouse for shipments according to your delivery address, which significantly cuts time costs and offers more efficient and convenient services on customers' behalf

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Reinforced material resists abrasion and transformation. Breathable mesh back and mesh seat provide optimal airflow and extra comfy. Prevent sweating and sticking for a long time sitting. The ergonomic office chair features with adjustable headrest, provide you with ergonomic support when sitting up, and comfort when reclining. Soft PU padded armrests help reduce pressure on forearms and elbows during long hours of use, enhance your home & office sitting experience.

Provide decent waist support thanks to the adjustable lumbar lever behind the mesh chair back. It is very easy to operate to meet different height requirements, perfectly supports your back. This comfortable mesh chair designed with invisible footrest which can be used as a rest recliner, suitable for home and office use. Perfect choice for you to nap, watch movies, work and relax. Relax yourself from heavy work. Smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility, stable enough to support any activity in your work. Also nylon material is friendly to the floor, won't scratch it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Chair For the Price
reviews.reviewText: Super breathable, comfy and ergonomic. This is the best chair and fits the price range perfectly. It takes about 30-40 mins to assemble super clear instructions and in the end it’s worth it. Sitting feels amazing, no more back discomfort or neck discomfort with the built in ergonomic back and head rest, everything is adjustable and it’s very sturdy and made of high quality plastic and mesh. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent office chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is well worth the price. It's well made, easy to put together and very comfortable. The various adjustments you can make satisfy all needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I made my bed and now I'm sitting in it
reviews.reviewText: Like everything I buy that I plan on keeping a long time, I researched the blank out of office chairs under $200. I would have gone over budget if I thought there was one better based on reviews and video reviews, features and price. I don't have very much experience with office chairs, so I let others with supposed experience and knowledge help me make a choice. Also, I think spending over $399 on a home office chair is quite possibly the definition of foolishness. So, with that out of the way, I find this chair to have mostly quality components. The most notable exception are the wheels which are a hard plastic which are horrible on our brick floors, so I replaced them with the "original rollerblade style office chair casters from Oasis". Those wheels are great and they fixed the wheel complaint for an additional thirty bucks. The seat is firm, which is great, but it isn't really ergonomic i.e. it lacks form, but it is wide and comfortable - I'm 6' and 210 pounds and over sixty. The multiple adjustments were a big selling point for me. They all work fine and feel like they will last. I especially wanted the adjustment that allows the seat to slide forward and back which isn't available on most office chairs in this price range, and it works fine. I was also hesitant to purchase a chair without at least a 300 pound rating because I would assume anything less would be cheaply made, and this chair feels solid and supportive. Assembly instructions are great, but it isn't real easy to accomplish without an extra set of hands, so keep that in mind. Given my lack of experience with office chairs, how can I give it an accurate rating? I think four stars is fair, but if it came with rollerblade style wheels (come on Colamy, better wheels wouldn't add much to the cost) and the seat was more ergonomic, I'm sure it would be a five star chair in all reviews. I made my choice, and now I'll live (not too unhappily) with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for good price
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a 6 year old Staples chair that began failing with this model. I was looking for adjustable lumbar, harms, swivel, tilt and height change. The foot and head rests were a bonus. It game quicker than first communicated. It was packed well. Directions for assembly were sufficient and the online video was also very good. The marking to note the front of the seat control attachment was hard to ready, but with some more lighting we figured out which end was the 'front' . The word front is on one end, but there is a small arrow pointed to the other end of the control, which is the real front. Easy to assemble. 10 nuts. At first I could not adjust the lumbar. I search through the other reviews and found that using an Allen wrench not supplied, I loosened the screws on the inside of the lumbar handle mechanism and it works great. The directions failed to mention lumbar support movement at all in the three page booklet that came in the box. The provided Allen wrench tool worked well, but could be used for the lumbar adjustment. I can now move the lumbar up and down without tools and it locks into place fine. I'm 5' 8", a large gal, and this chair is comfortable. I've only used it for 2 10 hours days so far, but really like it at the moment. I love the tilt up arms, never had this on a desk chair before, but I think it will be a space saver when not using the chair. Great for a small home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm 180 lbs; it has a very supportive and adjustable back. My body can lean back and relax. The overall quality is good—very stable and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Chair, and amazing customer service from Colamy!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first review ever on amazon. I reviewed my first chair, however it was damaged, the box was damaged and retapped, and after putting it together it was loose and not stable. I checked all of my work, however the first chair was defective, and it could be due to shipping mishandling. I reached out to amazon chat support, and they were absolutely horrible, they kept asking me for my government issues ID, in order to do anything. Long story short, they gave me a hard time, so I reached out directly to the company, and they made things right. They immediately apologized for amazons horrible service, and they addressed all of my concerns. This company stands behind their product, and treat their customers with respect. They have gained my business, and when im ready to buy more, I will buy form them directly. As far as for the chair, for the price you can't beat the quality, it landed as top office chair in both the Under $200 and $300 category.
